statements: DELETE FROM inventory_data WHERE quantity < 10 AND location = 'Warehouse A';
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 101 AND quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM cross_docking WHERE status = 'inactive' AND dock_id IN (1, 2, 3);

DELETE FROM CrossDocking WHERE product_id = 123 AND warehouse_id = 456;

DELETE FROM locations WHERE location_name = 'Warehouse A';
